Summary: Third night of Obvo and it followed. Seemed playfull the second night then distracted last night
divs: Sighting DetailsI've witnessed UFO sighting the past three nights with each night with more activity then the last and saw a bunch of silver and red streaks crash or land in the empty field behind my house. I was followed after making attempts to contact by flashing my brights and waving them to come down after it followed me to my f Friends house it turned off it's brights which reminded me of a really bright reflection like a rainbow and the light went to the surface metal and it glowed like lightsaber orange when my friends came outside it stopped and went away though that was Subday night. Will observe and report back if anymore tonight. Too shocked when I thought it was gonna land but I'll Try to get a video tonight
